1 . Short title and commencement.- ( I ) This ordinance may be called
the Foreigners (Amendment) Ordinance, 2015'
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Substitution of section l4D, Act XXXI of 1946.- In the Foreigners
Act, 1946 (XXXI of 1946), hereinafter referred to as the said Act, for section l4D,
the following shall be substituted, namely:-
..Registration of illegal immigrants.-(l) Any foreigner, who
before commencement of this Ordinance has no permission to stay in
pakistan, shall for registration be required to make application on the
format and in the manner as may be prescribed and shall be registered -
on that application by the National Database and Registration Authority
established under the National Database and Registration Authority
Ordinance,2000 (V[I of 2000).
(2)TheFederalGovemmentmaypermitaforeigner,registered
under sub-section (l), to work in Pakistan at such place, for such
period and on payment of sucll fee as may by prescribed '"'
3. Insertion of new section 17, Act XXXI of 1946.-ln the said Act,
after section 16, the following new section shall be inserted, namely:-
" I 7. Repeal.-{ 1 ) The Alien Registration Authority (Composition
and Functions) Order,2001 is hereby repealed.
(2) On repeal, under sub-section (l), all assets and liabilities of
the Alien Registration Authority shall stand transferred to the National
Database and RegistrationAuthority and shall be regulated under the
National Database and Registration Authority ordinance, 2000
(VIII of 2000).".
